desc: Maps a color in the palette to another color.

args.name: A
args.desc: The color to replace, or false for all

args.name: B
args.desc: The color which will replace A

args.name: palette
args.desc: (0) will reset the color in the Drawing palette only, (1) will reset the color in the Images palette only, (nil/false) will reset the color in both palettes.

usage.name: Reset a specific color to it's default.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color to reset to it's default.

args.name: p
args.desc: (0) will reset the color in the Drawing palette only, (1) will reset the color in the Images palette only, (nil/false) will reset the color in both palettes.

note: There are 2 palettes in LIKO-12: The Images palette which affects images only. And the Drawing palette which affects all other GPU functions.
